attributes.action: Funding for police To police Streets recruit more officers to uphold the law
attributes.additional_details:
This should no longer be at he discretion of Police.It should be policed by the Police.
To make shore that the Punishment fits the crime.
Riding e bikes and e scooters/Push bikes in Pedestrian Zones breaks the law.And is a crime the same as any other crime Therefor these cyclist need educating and punishment equal to the crime they commit.
Not only a fine .But teaching respect for the public like a   Cyclist course 
teaching highway code.Or there bike be Seized .Period.
attributes.background:
would like to see more officers Policing Streets.Upholding the law
So our Streets are safer.
Specifically in the area of the highways code act of E bikes.Push bikes and E  Scooters.Whom break the law riding all over our Pavements. putting  Pedestrians at risk.
Treat as a crime same as  any other.
